Here are the details :"},{"text":""}]}],"mode":"simple"}],"applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"},"secure":false,"requestFeedback":true},"2117802f8031493aab6b556e82b9961a":{"id":"2117802f8031493aab6b556e82b9961a","stepType":"LinkOutput","name":"Inserted Record Link","url":{"value":"(function execute() {

","mode":"script"},"label":{"value":"(function execute() {
    var message = '';
    var gr = new GlideRecord(vaInputs.record_table.getValue());
    if (gr.get(vaInputs.record_id.getValue()))
        message = gs.getMessage('View submitted request ({0})', gr.getDisplayValue(gr.getDisplayName()));

    return message;
})()
